author: Doug Roberson
title: Photo finish at AJC Peachtree Road Race | www.ajc.com
text:
A photo finish has delayed declaring a champion in the men’s open division of the AJC Peachtree Road Race on Saturday.
Scott Overall and Ben Payne hit the finish line of the 10k race at almost the same time.
It is believed to be the first photo finish in the history of the AJC Peachtee Road Race.
